trans-unit.target: TEXT_KINGME107_04938_SEQ_00<tab>It is all Wuk Lamat can do not to rush off after Gulool Ja.
TEXT_KINGME107_04938_TODO_00<tab>Speak with Wuk Lamat in front of Everkeep.
TEXT_KINGME107_04938_TODO_01<tab>Survey the designated location.
TEXT_KINGME107_04938_TODO_02<tab>Speak with Wuk Lamat.
TEXT_KINGME107_04938_TODO_03<tab>Speak with Wuk Lamat again.
TEXT_KINGME107_04938_ALISAIE_000_015<tab>Regardless of the circumstances, Zoraal Ja is Gulool Ja's father. The boy is bound to be confused.
TEXT_KINGME107_04938_WUKLAMAT_000_020<tab>If Gulool Ja is outside the tower, we need to find him as quickly as possible!
TEXT_KINGME107_04938_WUKLAMAT_000_021<tab>Even if he's used to getting around on his own, the wilds are still no place for a child.
TEXT_KINGME107_04938_ALISAIE_000_022<tab>Agreed. While Krile and Raha continue reviewing the data, the three of us should devote ourselves to the search.
TEXT_KINGME107_04938_WUKLAMAT_000_023<tab>Alright, let's head to the base of the tower and take it from there!
TEXT_KINGME107_04938_ALISAIE_000_025<tab>Heritage Found is a large area. Splitting up would allow us to cover more ground.
TEXT_KINGME107_04938_WUKLAMAT_000_030<tab>Well, here we are outside, but where do we even begin?
TEXT_KINGME107_04938_ALISAIE_000_031<tab>Perhaps someone has caught sight of Gulool Ja. Let's make inquiries nearby.
TEXT_KINGME107_04938_WUKLAMAT_000_032<tab>Good idea. Could you handle the outskirts, Alisaie?
TEXT_KINGME107_04938_WUKLAMAT_000_033<tab>In the meantime, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var> and I will head beyond that big wall.
TEXT_KINGME107_04938_WUKLAMAT_000_035<tab>Where have you gone, little one...?
TEXT_KINGME107_04938_SYSTEM_000_040<tab>Gulool Ja doesn't appear to be in the area. However, you catch sight of a group of people a short distance to the southwest.
TEXT_KINGME107_04938_WUKLAMAT_000_041<tab>You spotted those people too, yes? Perhaps they've seen something. Come on.
TEXT_KINGME107_04938_TAAPU_000_045<tab>Hm... I'm not familiar with your footfalls.
TEXT_KINGME107_04938_WUKLAMAT_000_050<tab>Looks like some sort of salvage yard... Well, let's ask after Gulool Ja.
TEXT_KINGME107_04938_TAAPU_000_051<tab>Gulool Ja isn't here.
TEXT_KINGME107_04938_WUKLAMAT_000_052<tab>You know the boy? Have you seen him?
TEXT_KINGME107_04938_WUKLAMAT_000_053<tab>Oh. Forgive me, I didn't know you were...
TEXT_KINGME107_04938_TAAPU_000_054<tab>No offense taken. My name is Taapu. My eyes may be useless, but my ears are sharper for it. I can recognize people by their footfalls, including Gulool Ja.
TEXT_KINGME107_04938_WUKLAMAT_000_055<tab>So he didn't come this way... Where in the world could he be?
TEXT_KINGME107_04938_TAAPU_000_056<tab>I do not know your voices. Who are you to Gulool Ja, and why do you search for him?
TEXT_KINGME107_04938_WUKLAMAT_000_057<tab>I'm...family. Though we're not related by blood, his father is my brother.
TEXT_KINGME107_04938_WUKLAMAT_000_058<tab>I've only just met Gulool Ja, and we haven't had the chance to talk properly.
TEXT_KINGME107_04938_WUKLAMAT_000_059<tab>But I'm about to do something that will make him hate me, and I wanted the chance to explain.
TEXT_KINGME107_04938_TAAPU_000_060<tab>His father is your brother? Then that means you're...
TEXT_KINGME107_04938_WUKLAMAT_000_061<tab>Yes. I'm Wuk Lamat, Vow of Resolve of Tuliyollal.
TEXT_KINGME107_04938_WUKLAMAT_000_062<tab>And I've journeyed here to bring my brother Zoraal Ja to account for murdering our people and our father.
TEXT_KINGME107_04938_WUKLAMAT_000_063<tab>When all is said and done, Gulool Ja may want nothing to do with me.
TEXT_KINGME107_04938_WUKLAMAT_000_064<tab>Nonetheless, I'll always consider him family. I'll always be there for him, and I want him to know that.
TEXT_KINGME107_04938_TAAPU_000_065<tab>It tears you apart to do what you must. The quiver in your voice tells the tale.
TEXT_KINGME107_04938_TAAPU_000_066<tab>Gulool Ja was headed south. There, he has a place that is as close to a home as he knows.
TEXT_KINGME107_04938_TAAPU_000_067<tab>Find and bare your heart to him.
TEXT_KINGME107_04938_TAAPU_000_068<tab>Should he in turn bare his heart to you, accept and respect his wishes. As Queen Sphene respected ours when she granted us a place in her realm.
TEXT_KINGME107_04938_WUKLAMAT_100_068<tab>I will, don't worry.
TEXT_KINGME107_04938_WUKLAMAT_110_068<tab>But, uh...what do you mean when you say Sphene respected your wishes?
TEXT_KINGME107_04938_TAAPU_120_068<tab>Out of concern for our well-being, Her Majesty had urged us to reside inside Everkeep.
TEXT_KINGME107_04938_TAAPU_130_068<tab>When we declined, not only did she gracefully accept our decision─she granted us the necessary supplies to make our home here.
TEXT_KINGME107_04938_TAAPU_140_068<tab>And since then, she has paid us regular visits to see how we fare.
TEXT_KINGME107_04938_WUKLAMAT_150_068<tab>Heh, that sounds like Sphene alright...
TEXT_KINGME107_04938_WUKLAMAT_000_069<tab>Well, thanks for telling me about Gulool Ja. I'll find him, and then we'll have a good talk.
TEXT_KINGME107_04938_WUKLAMAT_000_070<tab>We continue south, it seems. Let's keep our eyes peeled as we make our way.
TEXT_KINGME107_04938_TAAPU_000_075<tab>Gulool Ja appears to prefer solitude, but deep down he is lonely. Small wonder given his abandonment.
TEXT_KINGME107_04938_TAAPU_000_080<tab>Take good care of him, will you? I myself am quite fond of the boy.
TEXT_KINGME107_04938_WUKLAMAT_000_090<tab>It's a town...
TEXT_KINGME107_04938_WUKLAMAT_000_091<tab>And half of it is submerged!
TEXT_KINGME107_04938_WUKLAMAT_000_092<tab>The architecture looks nothing like what we've seen so far. It's more...Sharlayan.
TEXT_KINGME107_04938_WUKLAMAT_000_093<tab>Ah! There he is, among the ruins!
TEXT_KINGME107_04938_WUKLAMAT_000_094<tab>I only caught a glimpse, but there's no mistaking that tiny silhouette.
TEXT_KINGME107_04938_WUKLAMAT_000_095<tab>Let's hurry after him. It'd be a disaster if a building collapsed while he's inside!
